alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 5:25PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Navajo and Coconino Counties through 645 PM MST... At 524 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Forest Lakes, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Heber-overgaard. This includes the following highways... State Route 277 between mile markers 306 and 310. State Route 260 between mile markers 290 and 310. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
